synopsis.text: All fired up, Ryou Mizushima joins his middle school's badminton club, despite the absence of a dedicated coach. Relying solely on his physical prowess, he manages to secure a spot in the prefectural tournament. Catching the eye of the renowned coach Ebihara from Yokohama Minato High School, Ryou is presented with an opportunity to join their prestigious badminton team. Initially hesitant, Ryou's sister Rika encourages him to seize this chance, leading him to embark on a journey to become a top-tier athlete. With a diverse and talented group of teammates by his side, Ryou sets his sights on clinching victory in the inter-high tournament. As they navigate the challenges of adolescence and competition, the team's shared experiences weave a captivating tale of camaraderie, growth, and ambition.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
